abstract: The board of Bank of America expressed support on Wednesday evening for the company’s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, in a move that may for now reduce speculation about his job security after the acquisition of Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: The board of Bank of America expressed support on Wednesday evening for the company’s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, in a move that may for now reduce speculation about his job security after the acquisition of Merrill Lynch.

headline.main: Bank of America Board Backs Chief After Merrill Loss
